rows.label: tlk70000056_04_msg0001
rows.name: I heard my da talking in his sleep.

rows.label: tlk70000056_04_msg0002
rows.name:
He called my ma's name and
then said sorry to her...

rows.label: tlk70000056_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm not sure what I should do. Or
if I should do anything at all.

rows.label: tlk70000056_04_msg0004
rows.name:
It sucks. Why do I still have
to be a kid? If I was grown
up I'd know what to do.

rows.label: tlk70000056_04_msg0005
rows.name:
If I was a Driver like you guys,
I'd definitely know what to say
to make everything OK...
